entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it time to replace Marvin? #85206
    8.0.0
  • AES CFB 128 gives wrong results #85205
  • [API Proposal]: Add ForeachAsync in Enumerable #85199
  • Possible issue with `Equals` implementation in `ActivityTraceId` #85198
    Future
  • Support compressed symbols for Native AOT on Linux #85188
    Future

Closed

  • Some DateTimeTest format tests fail on the upcoming Fedora 39 #84763
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Test.ConsoleLoggerProcessorTests.ThrowDuringProcessLog_ShutsDownGracefully #71242
    Future
  • ConsoleLogger Queue optimization can lead to missed log entries #79812
    Future
  • 8.4 MB size regression updating System.Text.Json to 8.0.0 #84922
    8.0.0
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues throughout dotnet/runtime #78204
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableArray cast to IList does not conform to other collection's usage #84565
    Future
  • Potential performance regression in OrdinalIgnoreCase string comparision #59087
    Future
  • Ascii.Equals #84887
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests`+AOT failing on rolling builds #85012
    8.0.0
  • AV in ComWrappers.ComInterfaceDispatch.GetInstance<T> on NativeAOT during second lookup #84908
    8.0.0
  • Test failure profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd #82690
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Set `GTF_GLOB_REF` in `gtNewIndir` #85204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid bloom filter checks for IndexOfAnyExcept in ProbabilisticMap #85203
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Improve ProbabilisticMap performance for small value sets #85202
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Don't re-scan previously visited blocks in helperexpansion.cpp #85201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Special-case enums in Utf8.TryWrite handler #85196
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Add `CompressSymbols` opt-out option in NativeAOT #85192
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • offers the synchronous part of start and stop in IHostedService to run concurrently #85191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Use double VectorTableLookup on ARM in ProbabilisticMap #85189
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Fix superpmi.py to not cache local MCH files #85187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Adding Shuffle(). #85129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • DateTimeParse: accept all white space chars in the format string for DateTimeStyles Allow White #85102
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Drain ConsoleLogProcessor on Dispose #85162
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v16.0.2 #85179
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Use `gtNewIndir` everywhere #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tweak TimeProviderTaskExtensions handling of CreateTimer #85200
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix generic recursion condition when calling DeserializeAsyncEnumerable in NativeAOT. #85176
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in FileProviders PathUtils #85190
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 8.0.0
  • Handle not compatible parameters to IndexOf #84692
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: use blend rather then repair for profile inconsistencies #85171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #85093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Making sure we have at least one region per gen during plan phase #83076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add options to optimize for size/speed #85133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm][aot] Prevent llvm from optimizing away stack stores of valuetypes containing object references when they are returned from a method as a scalar. #85152
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Shared Readme: expand the section on GH Actions #85173
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Opt out of jitstress for profiler/multiple test #84507
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Add public Encoding.TryGetBytes/Chars #85120
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    breaking-change, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable `StripSymbols` by default #85139
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove common tests from the Roslyn3.11 test project. #85165
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Support non core types for signature and other type references #85112
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce parameter crashes with `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #67932
  • Formatter doesn't correctly format usage of fluent APIs #67931
  • [Feature request]: Code folding for invocation expressions that span multiple lines #67929
  • Very slow IntelliSense on relatively small code base #67926

PullRequests

Created

  • Call `PrimaryDependency` getter once in `PENamedTypeSymbol.GetUseSiteInfo` #67927
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Give more accurate information when we get an out of bounds error in LSP #67906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add A/B option to test if disabling 'recoverable text' helps/hurts us #67845
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build script (sh) does not correctly detect FreeBSD #47838
  • Hot Reload unavailable #47836
  • Dev cert issue #47834
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, updates #47832
  • Kestrel connection metrics - add protocol and TLS info? #47831

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix platform detection for FreeBSD #47839
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Guard ILogger calls that do work at call site #47837
    needs-area-label
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47833
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Add default configuration and logging to CreateSlimBuilder #47797
    area-mvc
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2164837 #47784
    area-mvc
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, stale, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Fix null property name handling logic in SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider #47775
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlexLayout - Frame Height Issue #14725
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException with resource localization #14724
  • Can't customize Entry Controls with XAML #14723
  • MAUI iOS - None of the input catalogs contained a matching stickers icon set or app icon set named "appicon" #14721
  • The linker ignores --linkskip attributes. #14719
  • Windows WebView2 ScriptDialogOpening CoreWebView2ScriptDialogOpeningEventArgsIt not functional #14717

Closed

  • Synchronous prompt on CustomScriptDialogOpening WebView2 #14691
  • Add IsVisible to ToolbarItem #14722

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
